articles.author: Matt O'Brien, Linley Sanders
articles.title: How Americans are using AI at work, according to a new Gallup poll - AP News
articles.description: A new Gallup poll finds that American workers have adopted artificial intelligence into their work lives at a remarkable pace over the past few years. Some 12% of employed adults say they use AI daily in their job, while nearly half say they've used it at lea…
articles.content:
American workers adopted artificial intelligence into their work lives at a remarkable pace over the past few years, according to a new poll.
